alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:37PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN KENTON, BOONE AND SOUTHWESTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 437 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Burlington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Covington, Florence, Independence, Erlanger, Edgewood, Elsmere, Fort Mitchell, Villa Hills, Taylor Mill, Fort Wright, Crescent Springs, Crestview Hills, Lakeside Park, Oakbrook, Burlington, Union, Delhi Hills, Mack, and Addyston. This includes I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 174 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
